name: TetribleS
description:
Created by Studio Allonalle.

Tetrible's only purpose is to make people suffer. If you don't feel like suffering you should play something else, like Tetris 99 or Puyo Puyo Tetris 2. We do not own the concept of falling pieces. There is no bugs in this game, only unpleasant surprises.

Designing, programming, art: Milja Krés (Minjutin)

Sometimes a helpful person: Mooltidude

Special thanks: Anna, Teemu, 

Sound effect(s): https://freesound.org/

Main menu music: Humorous And Comic Intro by Free Music https://soundcloud.com/fm_freemusic.  Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported License https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/deed.en_US. Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/.
